title: Basic Serif Font - Can't find a match
content:
Hi,  
Any idea what the font on the invite is? I've found similar, but certain characters (e.g. W, f, apostrophes) and the spacing are always different.  
Thanks in advance!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014175130im_/http:/typophile.com/files/balloon%20invite_4118.jpg)
author: Nelskie
